title: This Week: Adversarial Collaboration Entries
summary:
Key ideas:
-Adversarial collaboration is a way to present both sides of an argument in a unified way
-Readers submitted four entries on controversial topics for this contest
-The prize for the winning entry is $1000

Key learnings:
-Adversarial collaboration can be a useful tool for evaluating controversial issues
-Providing a prize and incentive can encourage engagement in collaborative efforts

Key questions:
-Which adversarial collaboration will win the contest?
-What can we learn from the process of adversarial collaboration in evaluating controversial issues?
